Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - RecognizeAI Android app

Landmark recognition app with camera, AI analysis, map, and saved photos features.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(sshpass -p '224024040502' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no debian@mnaks.online "ls /home/debian/ && which node && pm2 list 2>/dev/null || systemctl list-units | grep -i trip 2>/dev/null || echo ''checking processes...'' && ps aux | grep node")

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<selector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
    <item android:state_selected="true">
        <shape android:shape="rectangle">
            <solid android:color="@color/deep_blue_10" />
            <corners android:radius="16dp" />
            <stroke android:width="2dp" android:color="@color/deep_blue" />
        </shape>
    </item>
    <item>
        <shape android:shape="rectangle">
            <solid android:color="@color/white" />
            <corners android:radius="16dp" />
            <stroke android:width="1dp" android:color="@color/slate_200" />
        </shape>
    </item>
</selector>
XMLEOF)

Bash("D:\\TripAI\\app\\src\\main\\res\\layout\\activity_contact_us.xml" << 'XMLEOF'
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:background="@color/white"
    android:orientation="vertical">

    <!-- Top bar -->
    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:gravity="center_vertical"
        android:orientation="horizontal"
        android:paddingHorizontal="16dp"
        android:paddingTop="48dp"
        android:paddingBottom="16dp">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/btnBack"
            android:layout_width="40dp"
            android:layout_height="40dp"
            android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless"
            android:padding="8dp"
            android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back"
            app:tint="@color/deep_blue"
            android:contentDescription="Back" />

        <TextView
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_weight="1"
            android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_bold"
            android:gravity="center"
            android:text="@string/contact_us_title"
            android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
            android:textSize="18sp"
            android:textStyle="bold" />

        <View
            android:layout_width="40dp"
            android:layout_height="40dp" />

    </LinearLayout>

    <ScrollView
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="0dp"
        android:layout_weight="1"
        android:fillViewport="true">

        <LinearLayout
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:orientation="vertical"
            android:paddingHorizontal="24dp"
            android:paddingTop="8dp"
            android:paddingBottom="24dp">

            <!-- Topic selection label -->
            <TextView
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_bold"
                android:text="@string/contact_topic"
                android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                android:textSize="16sp"
                android:textStyle="bold" />

            <!-- Topic grid \(2x2\) -->
            <LinearLayout
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
                android:orientation="vertical">

                <!-- Row 1 -->
                <LinearLayout
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:orientation="horizontal">

                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/topicBilling"
                        android:layout_width="0dp"
                        android:layout_height="48dp"
                        android:layout_weight="1"
                        android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
                        android:background="@drawable/bg_topic_item"
                        android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_medium"
                        android:gravity="center"
                        android:text="@string/contact_topic_billing"
                        android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                        android:textSize="14sp" />

                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/topicAnalysis"
                        android:layout_width="0dp"
                        android:layout_height="48dp"
                        android:layout_weight="1"
                        android:background="@drawable/bg_topic_item"
                        android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_medium"
                        android:gravity="center"
                        android:text="@string/contact_topic_analysis"
                        android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                        android:textSize="14sp" />

                </LinearLayout>

                <!-- Row 2 -->
                <LinearLayout
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
                    android:orientation="horizontal">

                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/topicBug"
                        android:layout_width="0dp"
                        android:layout_height="48dp"
                        android:layout_weight="1"
                        android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
                        android:background="@drawable/bg_topic_item"
                        android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_medium"
                        android:gravity="center"
                        android:text="@string/contact_topic_bug"
                        android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                        android:textSize="14sp" />

                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/topicGeneral"
                        android:layout_width="0dp"
                        android:layout_height="48dp"
                        android:layout_weight="1"
                        android:background="@drawable/bg_topic_item"
                        android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_medium"
                        android:gravity="center"
                        android:text="@string/contact_topic_general"
                        android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                        android:textSize="14sp" />

                </LinearLayout>

            </LinearLayout>

            <!-- Message input -->
            <EditText
                android:id="@+id/etMessage"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="160dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_message_input"
                android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans"
                android:gravity="top|start"
                android:hint="@string/contact_message_hint"
                android:inputType="textMultiLine"
                android:padding="16dp"
                android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                android:textColorHint="@color/deep_blue_50"
                android:textSize="14sp" />

            <!-- Attach screenshot -->
            <LinearLayout
                android:id="@+id/btnAttach"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="48dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_attach_button"
                android:gravity="center"
                android:orientation="horizontal">

                <ImageView
                    android:layout_width="20dp"
                    android:layout_height="20dp"
                    android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
                    android:importantForAccessibility="no"
                    android:src="@drawable/ic_attach"
                    app:tint="@color/deep_blue" />

                <TextView
                    android:id="@+id/tvAttachLabel"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_medium"
                    android:text="@string/contact_attach"
                    android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                    android:textSize="14sp" />

            </LinearLayout>

            <!-- Attached image preview -->
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/imgAttached"
                android:layout_width="80dp"
                android:layout_height="80dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
                android:importantForAccessibility="no"
                android:scaleType="centerCrop"
                android:visibility="gone" />

            <!-- Send button -->
            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/btnSend"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="52dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_contact_button"
                android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_bold"
                android:gravity="center"
                android:text="@string/contact_send"
                android:textColor="@color/white"
                android:textSize="15sp"
                android:textStyle="bold" />

        </LinearLayout>

    </ScrollView>

</LinearLayout>
XMLEOF)

Bash("D:\\TripAI\\app\\src\\main\\res\\layout\\activity_contact_us.xml" << 'EOF123'
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:background="@color/white"
    android:orientation="vertical">

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:gravity="center_vertical"
        android:orientation="horizontal"
        android:paddingHorizontal="16dp"
        android:paddingTop="48dp"
        android:paddingBottom="16dp">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/btnBack"
            android:layout_width="40dp"
            android:layout_height="40dp"
            android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless"
            android:padding="8dp"
            android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back"
            app:tint="@color/deep_blue"
            android:contentDescription="Back" />

        <TextView
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_weight="1"
            android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_bold"
            android:gravity="center"
            android:text="@string/contact_us_title"
            android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
            android:textSize="18sp"
            android:textStyle="bold" />

        <View
            android:layout_width="40dp"
            android:layout_height="40dp" />

    </LinearLayout>

    <ScrollView
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="0dp"
        android:layout_weight="1"
        android:fillViewport="true">

        <LinearLayout
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:orientation="vertical"
            android:paddingHorizontal="24dp"
            android:paddingTop="8dp"
            android:paddingBottom="24dp">

            <TextView
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_bold"
                android:text="@string/contact_topic"
                android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                android:textSize="16sp"
                android:textStyle="bold" />

            <LinearLayout
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
                android:orientation="vertical">

                <LinearLayout
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:orientation="horizontal">

                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/topicBilling"
                        android:layout_width="0dp"
                        android:layout_height="48dp"
                        android:layout_weight="1"
                        android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
                        android:background="@drawable/bg_topic_item"
                        android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_medium"
                        android:gravity="center"
                        android:text="@string/contact_topic_billing"
                        android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                        android:textSize="14sp" />

                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/topicAnalysis"
                        android:layout_width="0dp"
                        android:layout_height="48dp"
                        android:layout_weight="1"
                        android:background="@drawable/bg_topic_item"
                        android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_medium"
                        android:gravity="center"
                        android:text="@string/contact_topic_analysis"
                        android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                        android:textSize="14sp" />

                </LinearLayout>

                <LinearLayout
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
                    android:orientation="horizontal">

                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/topicBug"
                        android:layout_width="0dp"
                        android:layout_height="48dp"
                        android:layout_weight="1"
                        android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
                        android:background="@drawable/bg_topic_item"
                        android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_medium"
                        android:gravity="center"
                        android:text="@string/contact_topic_bug"
                        android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                        android:textSize="14sp" />

                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/topicGeneral"
                        android:layout_width="0dp"
                        android:layout_height="48dp"
                        android:layout_weight="1"
                        android:background="@drawable/bg_topic_item"
                        android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_medium"
                        android:gravity="center"
                        android:text="@string/contact_topic_general"
                        android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                        android:textSize="14sp" />

                </LinearLayout>

            </LinearLayout>

            <EditText
                android:id="@+id/etMessage"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="160dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_message_input"
                android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans"
                android:gravity="top|start"
                android:hint="@string/contact_message_hint"
                android:inputType="textMultiLine"
                android:padding="16dp"
                android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                android:textColorHint="@color/deep_blue_50"
                android:textSize="14sp" />

            <LinearLayout
                android:id="@+id/btnAttach"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="48dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_attach_button"
                android:gravity="center"
                android:orientation="horizontal">

                <ImageView
                    android:layout_width="20dp"
                    android:layout_height="20dp"
                    android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
                    android:importantForAccessibility="no"
                    android:src="@drawable/ic_attach"
                    app:tint="@color/deep_blue" />

                <TextView
                    android:id="@+id/tvAttachLabel"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_medium"
                    android:text="@string/contact_attach"
                    android:textColor="@color/deep_blue"
                    android:textSize="14sp" />

            </LinearLayout>

            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/imgAttached"
                android:layout_width="80dp"
                android:layout_height="80dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
                android:importantForAccessibility="no"
                android:scaleType="centerCrop"
                android:visibility="gone" />

            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/btnSend"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="52dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
                android:background="@drawable/bg_contact_button"
                android:fontFamily="@font/plus_jakarta_sans_bold"
                android:gravity="center"
                android:text="@string/contact_send"
                android:textColor="@color/white"
                android:textSize="15sp"
                android:textStyle="bold" />

        </LinearLayout>

    </ScrollView>

</LinearLayout>
EOF123)
